metadata.synopsis: A PAD spoken by the player character when they finish reading Zanner Toobin's Formula book. The book says: [This book contains a dizzying array of mathematical equations and formulae. Scrawled in the margin, however, is a single line: 'Only Gond's true name can destroy the Neurocitor.']The player character reacts based on if they know the Gnomish name of Gond "Nebelun".
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -331; 6; -145Kill Zanner ToobinRead the book he has in his pocket.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: We already know the true name of Gond: Nebelun.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The true name of Gond? I don't know it, but somebody in this place must.
